Articles.Content: Once when I was loading KSP, a nyan cat started flying across the screen multiple times. I haven't installed any new mods or programs on KSP or windows, and it hasn't happened ever again. I dont know why this happened or if it was a mod, but it seems unlikely in that I haven't had any new mods for a few weeks and it only happened a few days ago. I have a video so could someone please tell me how to add a video into this so you can see what happened.

2 minutes ago, TheHiddenKitten said:

a nyan cat started flying across the screen

Egads, not again. There are zillions of threads about this already - it's an april fools joke built into ModuleManager. (it also triggers if you run the unofficial win64 hack).

@sarbianWhat have you done.
